PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In order to understand the influence of ratios between the donor polymer and acceptor , thicknesses of the photoactive layer , and the annealing temperatures on the photovoltaic properties , the current density - voltage ( J-V ) characteristics of the PBDT-TDPP-S:PC71BM - based devices at different ratios , thicknesses , and annealing temperatures are shown in Figures S4 , S5 , and S6 , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Donor polymer/acceptor ratio | Ratio between the donor polymer and acceptor |
| Thickness of the photoactive layer | Thickness of the layer made of photoactive material |
| Annealing temperature | Temperature at which the device is annealed |

Note:

* "Donor polymer" and "acceptor" refer to the materials used in the photoactive layer of the device.
* "Photoactive layer" refers to the layer of material that absorbs light and generates charge carriers (electrons and holes) in the device.
* "Annealing" refers to the process of heating the device to a specific temperature for a certain period of time, which can improve the performance of the device by altering the properties of the materials.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for the mistake in my previous response. Here are the valid entities that refer to the "Value of material property" in the given paragraph:

| Property Value | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Ratio between the donor polymer and acceptor | Ratio between the donor polymer and acceptor |
| Thickness of the photoactive layer | Thickness of the layer made of photoactive material |

The following entities do not clearly refer to the "Value of material property":

* "Annealing temperature" (refers to a process, not a material property)
* "Current density-voltage (J-V) characteristics" (refers to a property of the device, not a material property)

I hope this corrected table meets your requirements. Let me know if you have any further questions!
